properties.areaDesc: Reno Beach to The Islands OH; Maumee Bay to Reno Beach OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 9:57AM EST until January 18 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 knots,
with gusts up to 35 knots, and waves 2 to 4 feet. For the Gale
Warning, west winds 25 to 35 knots, with gusts up to 45 knots,
and waves 3 to 6 feet are expected. For the Low Water Advisory,
abnormally low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Maumee Bay to Reno
Beach OH and Lake Erie nearshore waters from Reno Beach to The
Islands OH.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST this
afternoon. For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 7
AM EST Sunday. For the Low Water Advisory, from 3 PM this
afternoon to 11 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 9:50 AM EST Saturday, the water level
at Toledo was 63 inches above low water datum, or 39 inches
above the critical mark for safe navigation. Strong west winds
over the western basin of Lake Erie are expected to cause water
levels to drop below the critical mark late this afternoon
through late Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
